pages.text: Players choose an Origin at the beginning of the game to gain benefits and drawbacks.$(br)$(br)You can view your chosen origin by pressing $(k:key.origins.view_origin) to open the GUI
Tired of your current origin or class? With the Orb of Origin you can choose new ones! For more info search 'Orb of Origin' in EMI

pages.title: Mods
pages.text: This pack uses $(l:https://modrinth.com/datapack/origins-minus)Origins Minus$() and $(l:https://modrinth.com/mod/origins-classes)Origins Classes$() to add easy to understand and fun to play origins to the game.
